abstract: The Treasury Department declined again to designate China as a currency manipulator, despite the increasing pressure from Congress.
snippet: The Treasury Department declined again to designate China as a currency manipulator, despite the increasing pressure from Congress.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON (Dow Jones)  The Treasury Department declined again Wednesday to designate China as a currency manipulator, despite the increasing pressure from Congress.

headline.main: Treasury Dept. Declines to Press China on Yuan
headline.print_headline: Treasury Dept. Declines To Press China on Yuan
